name: First Steps
steps: The day has come! Start your journey!
Join Professor Konstantinos at his lab.
Choose your first Temtem!
Meet the Professor outside...
Catch up with Max and the Professor in Briçal de Mar.
Aquire a Temessence phial from Luisouvenirs to explore further.
Further your training at Sophia's Dojo in Arissola.
Look for Sophia beyond the Gifted Bridges.
Find the key and free Sophia from Windward Fort.
Release Sophia!
Get back to the Arissola Dojo and challenge Sophia!
Talk to Adia Turay in the airship terminal.
Find Tihani in Turquesa
All aboard! Sail in the Narwhal!

name: Flight of the Narwhal
steps: Talk to captain Adia Turay.
Ask navigator Kemal for those charts.
Get Kemal a cup of coffee.
Bring that hot caffeine to Kemal.
Make sure the captain gets the charts.
Let Adia Turay know when you're ready to land.

name: Adventure in the Myrisles
steps: Find Rawiri at his Dojo in Mokupuni
Go to Mokupuni and beat Dojo Master Rawiri
Investigate what is going on at the Giant Banyan
Ambush the off-duty Belsotos at the pond
Meet Carlos outside the Giant Banyan
Infiltrate the Giant Banyan
Reach the Anak Volcano and stop the eruption
Put an end to Dr. Hamijo's dastardly plan!
Time to return to Nanga and Check on Tihani...
Beat Tihani to prove your mettle
Fly to Kisiwa on the Narwhal

name: A trip to Kisiwa...
steps: Go to the main deck and see what's going on...
Shiver me Timbers! Defeat the Belsoto pirates!

name: Shipwrecked in Tucma!
steps: Help Matthew find the survivors.
Talk to Octlana.
Find the hermit Naolin
Cross the Xolot Reservoir and reach Quetzal
Escape from the Mines of Mictlan
Ask for help at the local Dojo.
Complete the other quests
Find an airship to Kisiwa
Meet Manki in Kupleleza
Rockhop all the way to Kisiwa!

name: First Aid
steps: Buy some medicines from the Temporium
Bring the medicines to Octlana

name: Free Matthew
steps: Talk to Matthew in the prison
Convince the Captain to liberate Matthew
Scout the isle in the northern Xolot Reservoir
Find the renegade guards in an island in Xolot
Bring the idol back to the Captain of Quetzal

name: Beached Narwhal
steps: Ask the Guildmaster to repair the Narwhal.
Buy some means of transportation from Akatzin
Bring a Toxolotl to Akatzin
Ask Sugey to acid-proof your surfboard
Find the entrance to the cenote
Explore the Kakama Cenote
Take the idol
Reopen the gate to the Mines
Tell the Guildmaster you've reopened the Mines

name: Water Supply
steps: Go underground and get water samples
Get the second water sample
Bring the water samples to Sugey

name: Find Kemal
steps: Tell Izel that Octlana is fine
Ask the owner of the Jaguar Lounge about Kemal.
See if Jimena at the Lounge has heard of Kemal...
Ask a patron of the Jaguar Lounge (Yela) about Kemal...
Ask the drunk about Kemal...
Dead end! Leave the Jaguar Lounge...
Visit Manki at his house
Manki knows another way to Kisiwa, via rock-hopping

name: The Battle of Kisiwa
steps: Reach Vumbi and see what is going on.
Talk to Musa at the Temporium.
Help the resistance defend Vumbi!
Report back to Musa
Complete your Dojo training to join the Resistance.
Scout the Jino Gap for the Resistance.
Use the climbing gear to reach Upinzani...
Climb your way across the Kilima Range.
Hunt the three Belsoto spies in the desert.
Rendezvous with the Narwhal in the northwestern Kisiwa.
Operation Tusk: infiltrate Uhuru!
Operation Tusk: open the city gates!
The Battle of Uhuru: fight your way to the terminal!
Testify at the First Archipelago Congress.
Ask Dr. Sasaya about the Belsoto.
Report back to Carlos.
Search the Giant Banyan for clues.
Get Musa's approval for the mission.
Fly to Cipanku on Archipelago Congress business!

name: A Better Future
steps: Ask Pasiphaë at her Turquesa townhouse.

name: A Rock Too Far
steps: Report the missing kid to the Lifeguard!
Talk to Zulia again
Find Yaba's friend, a girl named Tochtli
Give the bad news to Zulia
Ask the tracker to help you find Yaba.
Find Yaba at the eastern tip of Kupeleleza being held captured by a pair of bandits.
Get back to Zulia for your reward

name: Archipelago Colors
steps: Get some purple paint from Luisouvenirs ((Brical de Mar))
Briçal de Mar
Bring the purple paint to Ara in The Flywalk or Kisiwa.
The Flywalk
Find some alizarin red.
Mines of Mictlan
Bring the alizarin pigment to Ara, in Omninesia or Kisiwa
The Flywalk
Acquire lapiz blue pigment in Kisiwa.
Find Ara and give her the lapis blue pigment.

name: Better Future: Ariadne
steps: Find Ara in Omninesia and ask her to mentor Ariadne.
Return to Pasiphae's house and tell Ariadne.
Visit Ara and Ariadne in Kisiwa.

name: Better Future: Asterion
steps: Ask Adia Turay to help Asterion
Return to Pasiphae's and tell Asterion the good news.
Check on Asterion aboard the Narwhal.

name: Better Future: Phaedra
steps: Get Phaedra a place in Arbury University.

name: Blueprint Delivery
steps: Deliver the blueprints to the Guildmaster of Tucma.
Get back to Myrisles Engineering.

name: Cultist Hunt
steps: Find the Crystal Temtem cultist.
Report back to Valentina

name: Endaira's Quest
steps: Find a coveted copy of "Endaira's Quest" in Kisiwa.

name: For Science!
steps: Locate Zamzaditta, somewhere in Kisiwa.
Bring Zamzaditta a Gyalis egg.
Bring Zamzaditta a Hidody egg.
Deliver the incubator prototype to Akihiro.

name: Freeing bandits
steps: Get the prison key from the off-duty Smith.
Free Tlaloc from the prison.
Rejoin Tlaloc and Tokatl in the Xolot island.

name: Gone with the Sillaro
steps: Find the missing pendant...
Return the pendant to Clara in Zadar

name: Heartbeats
steps: Look for Elizabeth in Tucma.
Find Macuil in the wreck of the Narwhal.
Bring a Zizare to Macuil.
Join Macuil and Elizabeth back in the bandit hideout.
Report back to Jeremy at the Vumbi Dojo.

name: If You Build It
requirements: Access to Kisiwa Completion of On Solid Footing?
reward: Access to Kisiwa, Completion of On Solid Footing?
steps: Ask the architect in Windward Fort for help.
Get the architect a Vulor for inspiration.
Return to Atoll Row.
Order the building materials at the Smiths' Guild.
Board the Ocra at the Quetzal airship terminal.
Find Captain Makamba - ask in the Vumbi Dojo?
Find Captain Makamba - try again in Upinzani.
Rendezvous with Makamba at Nanga airport.
Get back to Salamasina.

name: Lights, camera, action!
steps: Get the screenplay from Visesia's agent.
Study the script with the help of the director.
Tell the camerawoman you're ready.
Star in a movie with Visesia!

name: Lottie's Diary
steps: See what Carlos can learn from Lady Lottie's diary...

name: Message in a Bottle
steps: Consult with Carlos in Briçal.
Alternatively, if you have already advanced in the main story, talk to Old Despina in Turquesa.

name: Missing Kids
steps: Find Yusuf and Roger in Briçal.
Report back to the Headmistress of the Accademia.

name: No Head For Numbers
steps: Talk to the Accademia receptionist.
Talk to Josep at the Accademia.
Look for the slip of paper in the Briçal Temporium.
Return the slip of paper to Josep at the Accademia.

name: On Solid Footing?
steps: Get a safety certificate from Myrisles Engineering.
Convince Kalei to end his vacation.
Investigate Kalei's hotel room.
Ask about Kalei at the Sirokos bar.
Bribe Ektli with a Cerneaf.
Meet with Ektli at the Malachite furniture shop.
Look for Kalei, west of Turquesa.
Convince Minos you are not a Belsoto.
Find "Headmaster Dolça" in Deniz.
Unmask Kalei at the Accademia.
Meet with Kalei at the airport and escort him.
Go back to Coral Plaza and rejoin Salamasina.
Buy a slot of land in Atol Row from Salamasina.

name: Paparazzo
steps: Locate the famous Visesia in Citerior Omninesia
Talk to Paparazzo.

name: Pigepic Fan
requirements: Capture Pigepic and show it to the Cute Toddler
reward: Capture Pigepic and show it to the Cute Toddler

name: Salty Business
steps: Acquire the goods from Lorenzo, near Turquesa.
Bring back the salt to Parfumier.

name: Serbatiyo's Wrath (quest)
steps: Find Minha in the desert.
Buy "Fables of the Isles at Tossaint Books in Uhuru.
Get the book from the bookcase.
Find the entrance to the Sea-Queendom.

name: Study Up
steps: OBJECTIVE NEEDED
Giant Banyan
Vulvir
Mokupuni

name: Temtem Connoisseur
steps: Breed a Bigu and bring it to the man

name: Temtemed Out
steps: Cheer up Ige doing an exhibition fight with Lyato.
Temtem up with Ige.
Bring Ige an Oceara.
Learn the technique Serbatiyo's Wrath and find Ige.
Fight Ige's souped-up Temtem!
Get a reward from Lyato.

name: The Denizan Icarus
steps: Show Daedalus your Tempedia
Daedalus (Thalassian Cliffs) needs a Barnshe.

name: The Turquesa Ferry
steps: Ask at the Riverine Fellowship in Turquesa
Ask Jana, the owner of Sirokos
Find Idris at the pier of Turquesa.
Find the missing ferry, somewhere in the Sillaro.
Break the bad news to Idris in Turquesa.
Inform Theodora about the cancelled ferry.

name: Tour Guide
steps: Give the tourist in Arissola a guided tour of Deniz
Inform the tour operator in Arissola of your success

name: Travel Writer
steps: Omninesia.

name: Wild Imagination
steps: Do you know as much about Temtem as little Liliana?
